options.text: "Everybody in @@REGION@@ loves basketball," exaggerates famed athlete @@RANDOM_NAME@@, dribbling on your carpet. "Catch! Pass it here! Look at that: Nothing but net." [[color=blue]Sports are legal[/color]]
options.result: @@LEADER@@ can often be seen hanging around playgrounds chatting with the kids

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: deadly medical pandemics
policiesAndNotabilities.name: deadly medical pandemics

options.text: Dance instructor @@RANDOM_MALE_NAME@@ waltzes into your office. He takes your hand and begins a foxtrot. "Isn't this invigorating? Come, let me teach you to pirouette around delicate situations you may encounter."
options.result: policy reversals are more often graceful demi-détournés than u-turns

options.text: "Crikey!" nature documentarian @@RANDOM_NAME@@ exclaims, creeping into your office. "What we've got 'ere is a politician in its natural 'abitat. If only it would get outside and let its wild side out, it wouldn't have near so many national crises to deal with."
options.result: @@LEADER@@ has been known to make speeches in fishing waders

options.text: Your niece suddenly squeals. "Look at this adorable puppy! I need to share it with my friends! Do you have a Farcebook account? It would really help connect with people and let me send you this GIF." [[color=blue]Must have internet[/color]]
options.result: @@LEADER@@ has more friends than ever before

options.text: Your nephew appears and rolls a set of dice on your desk. "According to my manual of Castles & Kobolds, I just rolled a 20 on my Charisma-check for you to game with me. Come on, we need a healer: got a fizzy Eckie-Cola here with your name on it."
options.result: the government has stated an intention to min-max its stats for 'teh pwnage'

options.text: Flat-cap wearing Heritage Locomotive Enthusiast @@RANDOM_MALE_NAME@@ snorts in laughter at the geekiness on display. "You'll be wantin' a proper hobby: model engines, to show yer love of craftsmanship, and of steel, steam and smoke."
options.result: a light facial coating of soot is seen as the mark of an honest and hardworking man

options.text: "Just tell them your hobbies are reading, and walking, and socialising," suggests CV-writer @@RANDOM_NAME@@. "That way nobody can judge you or form conclusions about you."
options.result: @@LEADER@@ is described as an everyday person with normal tastes and the usual interests
